main event: An unidentified bright light was observed moving erratically in the sky over Longmeadow, Massachusetts on April 23, 1952.
interesting points: The object was observed for about 30 seconds before disappearing.
The object was described as bright, with a star-like color and shape.
The object performed rapid climbs and dives.
The object's brightness was about 1/x as bright as a star.
The object's shape changed as its altitude changed.
sighted object: a bright light in the sky
